S.FORM: mahiya nu bali u panay mahuyyahuy lacul nu dadiw mahiya nu bali u panay mahuyyahuy mapulung kita i umah miketus tu panay miketus tu panay kami mudadiw kita haw cabay u belih nu Hulam malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan u dadiw nu niyazu' namudadiw cina ni Kala, wawa nu Sakul niyazu'
